alert.note: Alert for Fountain; Parke; Vermillion (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 26 at 2:43PM EDT until September 26 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Fountain County in west central Indiana... Northwestern Parke County in west central Indiana... Central Vermillion County in west central Indiana... * Until 315 PM EDT. * At 243 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Newport, or 17 miles southeast of Danville, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Kingman around 250 PM EDT. Yeddo around 255 PM EDT. This includes Interstate 74 between mile markers 13 and 16. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
